text: Sace kho pana atthi paro loko atthi sukatadukkaṭānaṃ kammānaṃ phalaṃ vipāko athāhaṃ kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjissāmī ti ayamassa paṭhamo assāso adhigato hoti
edit: Sace kho pana atthi paro loko atthi sukatadukkaṭānaṃ kammānaṃ phalaṃ vipāko athāhaṃ kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjissāmī ti ayamassa paṭhamo assāso adhigato hoti

translations.transtext: (1) If the other world exists, [and] the fruit of good and bad actions exists, then I will get reborn in a good heaven after the death of the body. This is the first obtained consolation.
